name: Taxi
description: A sliding Tile puzzle game with 29 levels ranging from easy to skull cracking. A killer soundtrack and great visuals make this a must play game! Try to get the taxi from start to the airport on each level.
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista, 7,8,10 Processor: 1 GHZ Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: yes, please.
